sentences.en: An iterative decoding scheme is proposed for the concatenation a convolutional code and a GMSK modulator.
sentences.cn: 提出了卷积码与GMSK( 高斯最小移频键控)调制器级联系统的一种迭代译码方案.

sentences.en: Delegate types also provide a binary + operator, which performs delegate concatenation.
sentences.cn: 委托类型也提供二元+运算符, 该运算符执行委托串联.

sentences.en: He had a three-brush motor, with dynamic brake and intermittent on one speed only—his system was a concatenation of a lot of different ideas.
sentences.cn: 迪肯说，“他有一个三刷马达，配有动态制动和以均速间歇——他的系统将不同想法综合串联在了一起。

sentences.en: Illegal concatenation of incompatible requests ( perhaps version mismatch )
sentences.cn: 不兼容请求的串联非法 ( 可能是版本不匹配 )

sentences.en: In addition , concatenation of LM 3914 s could increase number of the circuit effectively.
sentences.cn: 对LM3914采用级联,还可有效地提高细分电路的细分数.

sentences.en: It was caused by an improbable concatenation of circumstances.
sentences.cn: 这是由不可思议的巧合所引起的.

sentences.en: Listing 2 shows a sample algorithm which creates such a key by string concatenation.
sentences.cn: 清单 2 显示了一个通过字符串串联创建此类键的示例算法。

sentences.en: Memory is nothing else than a certain concatenation of ideas.
sentences.cn: 记忆不是别的,只是一种观念的联系.

sentences.en: String concatenation is the primary point of entry for script injection.
sentences.cn: 字符串连接是脚本注入的主要入口点.

sentences.en: The Arab revolt of 2011 belongs to a rare class of historical events: a concatenation of political upheavals, one detonating the other, across an entire region of the world.
sentences.cn: 2011年的阿拉伯起义属于一类罕见的历史事件：政治剧变的串联，这些动乱相互引爆，遍及一整个世界性的区域。

sentences.en: The concatenation cost function is a key factor affecting the naturalness of synthesized speech.
sentences.cn: 拼接代价函数是决定合成音自然度的重要因素之一.

sentences.en: The following illustration depicts a concatenation operation on two sequences of characters.
sentences.cn: 下图演示对两个字符序列执行的串联运算.

sentences.en: The standard query operator Methods: That perform concatenation are listed in the following section.
sentences.cn: 下面一节中列出了执行串联的标准查询运算符方法.

sentences.en: Use standard arithmetic operators for numbers and a concatenation operator for combining strings.
sentences.cn: 对于数可使用标准算术运算符,对于组合字符串可使用串联运算符.

sentences.en: Which of these approaches is adopted depends on the concatenation of a number of factors.
sentences.cn: 这些方法中究竟采用哪一种,视若干相互联系的因素而定.

trans.tran_cn: 一系列互相关联的事物
trans.tran_en: a series of events or things joined together one after another
